Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Clark, Halsted and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute near Blackhawk/North Ave
ShortDescription: 37 Sedgwick buses temp. rerouted NB: Sedgwick, Blackhawk, Larrabee, North Ave and Sedgwick; SB: Sedgwick, North Ave, Wells, Division and Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Blackhawk/North Ave, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sedgwick, Blackhawk, Larrabee, North Ave and Sedgwick.

Southbound buses will operate via Sedgwick, North Ave, Wells, Division and Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/Foster
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Lawrence, Ashland and Foster due to, street blockage near Damen/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Lawrence, Ashland and Foster: due to, street blockage near Damen/Foster.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
